page.title: 13SCHOOLS IN MIRFIELD
page.content: There is a three tier pyramid in Mirfield.{The First Schools:Lower {Hopton, Crowlees, Battyeford,Knowle, {Old Bank,Wellhouse.}These feed the {Middle Schools:Castle Hall, Wellhouse, {and Battyeford.}These in turn feed {Mirfield High.}The mid-80s have seen a fall in the number of pupils entering schools,this has caused some problems in the staffing of Schools.The problem of{falling rolls}has just entered Battyeford Middle,but their implications are yet to be fully appreciated.--Dewsbury has adopted a return to the "old" 11-16 system.What will happen in Mirfield? There are very few Asian children in Mirfield Schools,(approx 15 in total), is this lack of experience of other cultures a future problem. A growing number of children from Mirfield attend{Private {Schools in Wakefield,Batley & Leeds.
